document.heading: Community Park West Designation Act of 1981

history.narrative: Law 4-57, the “Community Park West Designation Act of 1981,” was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 4-184, which was referred to the Committee on the Judiciary. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on September 15, 1981, and September 29, 1981, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on October 19, 1981, it was assigned Act No. 4-98 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review.
